class.name: GKSavedGame
class.description: Instances of this class are returned after you save a game with GKLocalPlayer's save_game_data, or after you load the game data with GKLocalPlayer fetch_saved_games

method.name: load_data
method.description: Loads the game data, and invokes the provided callbacj with the first argument being a PackedByteArray and the second argument being a Variant encoding an error, if not-nil it contains a string description of the problem.

members.member: The name of the device where the player saved the game.
